did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Lesbian, feminist, and gay publications and ephemera from and about Taiwan, Hong Kong, Thailand, and China, 1987-1996.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Articles and magazines collected by Fishel while a graduate student in Anthropology at Cornell University dealing with gender, sexuality and homosexuality in numerous Asian countries. Fishel spent time studying in Taiwan.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Articles and magazines collected by Fishel while a graduate student in Anthropology at Cornell University dealing with gender, sexuality and homosexuality in numerous Asian countries. Fishel spent time studying in Taiwan.
Included are one issue of ASIAN LESBIAN NETWORK, published in Thailand; several issues of AWAKENING; and other periodicals. These are cataloged separately.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Lesbian, feminist, and gay publications and ephemera from and about Taiwan, Hong Kong, Thailand, and China, #7698. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
